column1: Danghara District or Nohiya-i Danghara (Tajik: Ноҳияи Данғара) is a district in Khatlon Region
column2: Tajikistan. Its capital is the town Danghara. The population of the district is 161

column1: The district has an area of about 2
column2: 000 km2 (800 sq mi) and is divided administratively into one town and eight jamoats. They are as follows:
